Table1.News title: Vaccinated in California? You’re entered to win
Table1.News content: No matter when you were vaccinated for COVID-19, you’re automatically entered to win up to $1.5 million in California’s Vax for the Win. No entry form required! Giveaways start Friday June 4, when 15 people will win $50,000 each.

Table1.News title: Get vaccinated and you could win $1.5 million!
Table1.News content: Getting your COVID-19 vaccine is not just the right thing to do — here in California, it’s rewarding. The Vax for the Win incentive program is giving vaccinated Californians a chance to win up to $1.5 million! Not vaxed? Start now and you’ll be entered to win. The next 2 million Californians to start and complete their vaccination will also get a $50 card!

California is preparing to get back to normal. On June 15, capacity and distancing restrictions will be lifted for most businesses and activities. Large-scale indoor events will have vaccination or negative test requirements for attendees through at least October 1.
